articles.name: [Release Note] Nov 24, 2016 "Shifter now supports migration from WP-CLI"
articles.title: [Release Note] Nov 24, 2016 "Shifter now supports migration from WP-CLI"
articles.body:
We're so glad to announce it!
We proudly present wp-cli single command to migrate from your WordPress site to the Shifter.

The "wp shifter" command

wp shifter is the WP-CLI command that enables you to import/export your WordPress site for the Shifter.
https://github.com/getshifter/wp-cli-shifter

How to upload your website to Shifter through WP-CLI.

Simply run the following command.
Never forget input your Shifter username and password.

$ wp shifter upload
Shifter Username: jack
Password (will be hidden):
Success: Logged in as jack
Creating an archive:   100% [=======================] 0:23 / 0:04Success: Created an
archive.
Success: 🍺 Archive uploaded successfully.

That's all for import it.
You can start your website on the Shifter.

How to install "wp shifter" command

Installing via package command

$ wp package install shifter/cli:@stable

Installing manually

$ mkdir -p ~/.wp-cli/commands && cd -
$ git clone git@github.com:getshifter/wp-cli-shifter.git

Add following into your ~/.wp-cli/config.yml.

require:
  - commands/wp-cli-shifter/cli.php

Other updates

  • You can now change your account information.
    • email address & password
  • Update WordPress Image.
  • Fixed some minor bugs.

articles.title: [Release note] Nov. 10, 2016
articles.body:
• Now you can download the archives files which you imported, from "Import List" menu!

articles.name: [Release note] Nov. 17, 2016
articles.title: [Release note] Nov. 17, 2016
articles.body:
This update contents many internal updates implementation mainly for GA.
You will be able to use these features on the console.
I know it's worth waiting!

  • Add new API for using your custom domain.
    • Of course, HTTPS and HTTP/2 support your custom domain!
  • We're working on the API fro creating archives from your exist projects on the Shifter.
  • We started gathering of usage and calculation of billing information.
    • We will let you know before we start of charging on you.
  • Fixed some minor bugs.

We thank you for beta users' feedback. It helps to improve our service. Here will becoming one of the FAQ:
https://github.com/getshifter/BugReport/issues/5

The public site the Shifter creates is static contents so that some WordPress built-in feature, such as comment system, searching contents or plugins, doesn't work.
However, we believe that they can provide sufficient and better UX through similar functions with excellent external services and integration. We will also show you in the blog's integration category, so please consider using external services as it is a great opportunity.
https://blog.getshifter.io/integration/

Did you find the bug with Shifter? Never hesitate to report it to us!
https://github.com/getshifter/BugReport

articles.name: [Release note] Nov. 4, 2016
articles.title: [Release note] Nov. 4, 2016
articles.body:
Now you can site search cooperate with external search services!
Shifter recommends that assist with external search services in your site search.
We're working on documents for our recommendation search services and how to cooperate with it.

New feature

  • Start to provide project's disk usage on your management page.
  • Add RSS feed to your published site.
    • Generated feed comply with WordPress Feeds.
    • (https://codex.wordpress.org/WordPress_Feeds)
  • We added plugin for Algolia search by default.
    • https://www.algolia.com
    • https://community.algolia.com/wordpress/
    • Integrate with Shifter and Algolia: https://blog.getshifter.io/integration/integration-to-algolia/
  • Fixed and modified some minor bugs typo and display formats.

Did you find a bug on our beta service? Please let us know:
https://github.com/getshifter/BugReport

articles.name: [Release note] Oct. 20, 2016
articles.title: [Release note] Oct. 20, 2016
articles.body:
• Add release note section.
  • Modify and update UI.
  • Fixed a few minor bugs.
  • Changes on published site.
    • Add Expires header each MIME Type.
      • css, Javascript => 1 month
      • image => 1 year
      • application/* => 1 week
      • others => 1 day
  • Fixed “404 Not Found” bugs for some posts.
  • Speed up WordPress
    • Modifying some server parameter gives WordPress to accelerate.

articles.name: How is Shifter managed?
articles.title: How is Shifter managed?
articles.body: Shifter has it’s own admin menu separate from WordPress that gives you control of the site. You can turn WordPress on and off, converting to and from a static site. You can manage domain settings, multiple websites, and more.

articles.name: Is Shifter also a hosting service?
articles.title: Is Shifter also a hosting service?
articles.body: Yes! Shifter is both a WordPress static site generator and a hosting solution. We host the files that Shifter creates and allows you to connect custom domains. We do not, however, offer domain registration at this time.

articles.name: How much does Shifter cost?
articles.title: How much does Shifter cost?
articles.body: Shifter hosting costs are minimal. Since static files are small and do not require computing, storage fees are less expensive. These price benefits get passed on to you, the consumer.

articles.name: When will beta be available?
articles.title: When will beta be available?
articles.body:
Beta is currently available! Sign up and join our beta testing service. The beta testing service is free of charge during its period.

There is some limitation for its feature.
